concept.title: Recovering failed over nodes
concept.shortdesc: The options for recovering failed over nodes are delta node recovery and full recovery.

conbody.p: Delta node recovery allows a failed over node to be recovered by re-using the data on its disk and then resynchronizing the data based on the delta change.
With full recovery mode, the data files are removed from the failed over server node and then, during rebalance, the node is populated with new data files (active and replica vBuckets).
